originalText.text: My son has been going to Honma Dojo for the past 3 years. I cannot recommend it enough. Not only is it the Karate discipline, method mentality and traditions... taught in its Purest form, and not some mashed up form of martial arts, but it has enriched my son, and the rest of their students with Integrity, Focus, Perseverance, Strength of Body and Mind, Culture, Life Lessons, self control, respect as well as self respect, endurance, empathy, humility, and a growth mindset of higher thinking philosophy. The skills of not only the self defense and strength of body, but more importantly the Strength of the Mind!! Sensei Honma is one of a kind, so authentic and deeply invested in his students on every level. Very personal, not commercial or generic at all. I feel so blessed to have come across this hidden gem of a Dojo, while the NYC market is saturated with multiple commercial Martial Arts places that don't offer nearly as much value to a child's life! 100% Recommend Karatedo Honma Dojo.

originalText.text: I joined Honma Dojo after being impressed with my kids' classes, and now my whole family is doing it. It's good for the mind as much as for the body. Sensei Honma is a true Teacher. The classes are both intensive and calming. The dojo is very welcoming. It brings together an incredibly diverse and interesting community of people.

text.text: I joined Honma Dojo after being impressed with my kids' classes, and now my whole family is doing it. It's good for the mind as much as for the body. Sensei Honma is a true Teacher. The classes are both intensive and calming. The dojo is very welcoming. It brings together an incredibly diverse and interesting community of people.

originalText.text: I've been affiliated with Honma Dojo for over 10 years. Sensei Honma is an incredibly skilled teacher who embodies great humility, depth, and concern for his students. Karate training at Honma Dojo continues to teach me valuable lessons about perseverance, hard work, integrity, and community. I have also made life-long friendships here. Unlike any other dojo that I know of, this dojo feels like a true karate school, where students of all ages are valued and accepted at whatever stage they are at in their karate journey.

text.text: I've been affiliated with Honma Dojo for over 10 years. Sensei Honma is an incredibly skilled teacher who embodies great humility, depth, and concern for his students. Karate training at Honma Dojo continues to teach me valuable lessons about perseverance, hard work, integrity, and community. I have also made life-long friendships here. Unlike any other dojo that I know of, this dojo feels like a true karate school, where students of all ages are valued and accepted at whatever stage they are at in their karate journey.

originalText.text: I joined Karatedo Honma Dojo six years ago as a way to reset my life in the middle of career and personal transitions. It has been my anchor. I always wanted to do martial arts but had never tried, and I stumbled into a place that has been as good for my mental and spiritual health as my physical health. Sensei Honma has taught me how karate is not simply about advancement and working out (though it is), but also about patience (Osu) and grace, two things I needed more of in my life. Having said that, I feel very strong and powerful as a result of being part of this community and I recommend it to anyone who is looking for something deeper than a gym. Life-changing.

originalText.text: Honma Dojo is a fantastic Karate school with exceptional teachings.  So thankful to have found it.  Sansei Honma teachers the skill of Japanese karate, dedication and focus and many life lessons along the way.  Highly recommend.
